title: Encore: The Woman in the Moon
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In honor of Indigenous Peoples' Day, we bring back a favorite tale from the archives: Irene Bedard (Pocahontas, Ralph Breaks the Internet) stars in an Alaska Native story about the out-of-this-world power that comes when we work together.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Encore: The Woman in the Moon
